abstract: Update | 2:39 p.m. Medtronic said on Monday that it is buying two privately held makers of heart-valve technologies, paying about $1.03 billion in cash for both.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:39 p.m. Medtronic said on Monday that it is buying two privately held makers of heart-valve technologies, paying about $1.03 billion in cash for both.

headline.main: Medtronic to Buy 2 Heart-Valve Tech Makers
